document_data.mainbody:
Obelia Toobin was a daughter of Zanner Toobin, a Gondian rock gnome foundry worker who lived in the city of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Obelia was a woman with a dark skin tone and short hair of fine curls. She had brown eyes.
In the , Zanner Toobin, along with his fellow Gondians, worked at the Steel Watch Foundry in Baldurs Gate against their will, forced into slave labor by Lord Enver Gortash and his Cultists of Bane. One of the two motivations for the slaves compliance was the fact that the Gondians family members were abducted and held hostage within the drowned Iron Throne headquarters. Obelia Toobin, Zanners daughter, was among the cults hostages. It was unknown if the hostages were rescued before the conclusion of the Absolute crisis, or if the prison was flooded in retaliation for the foundry workers uprising.
